Text:
Discovering that Claire is at the beach, Cid tries
to avoid running into her as much as possible.
However...
Do you have any idea...how much I've looked for you?
N-No idea...
Do you remember...your promise to me?
I-I don't...

I guessed as much. I couldn't find you no matter how
much time I spent looking. I started thinking maybe
you were avoiding me...

(Huh? I thought she would get physical right away...
Maybe she's feeling down?)

But that wasn't the case, was it? You wanted to play
with me too, right, Cid? That's why you're out here
like this...
You won't run away anymore, will you?

Judging by the tone in Claire's voice, Cid instantly
realizes he can't escape.

(I knew it would end up like this! If I flee now,
she'll resent me for the rest of my life... Oh well,
guess I'll have to play along.)

O-Of course not... Really looking forward to hanging
out with you, Claire.

Heheh. Now that's more like it. Come along with your
big sis!
O-Okay...

Cid is led away by Claire to spend time with her.
She has an idea and makes him lie down on the
beach sand.
Um, Claire...what're you doing?
You'll see once I'm done. Don't worry. It'll be fun!

Claire enthusiastically starts tossing sand onto Cid,
who lies on his back.

(I'm...totally being buried, aren't I? The sand feels
nice and cool, but I'm not too sure about the "fun"
part...)
Heheh! I've always wanted to bury you.
(That's a pretty double-edged confession...)

Before Cid knows it, everything except his face is
completely buried in the sand.
Ahh! I can't move! Oh no!
...So, what's gonna happen to me now?

Not sure. It was fun burying you, but I hadn't
thought about what to do with you next. I mean,
I can't just leave you here...

I'm burying you sideways now, but maybe I'll bury you
upright next.
...Sure, I'll leave it to you, big sis.

After that, Cid is buried upright according to
Claire's wishes.

After a while, Claire digs Cid out. Then, while
dragging him by the hand, she steps into the
shallow water.
Here goes, Cid! Take this!
Eeeek!

Claire splashes a large amount of seawater at Cid,
but he dodges it just in time.

Hmm... You dodged that surprisingly well. I'll need
to go harder next time. How about...this!

(It'll look unnatural if I keep dodging her splashes.
I'll need to let some hit me occasionally.)
Whoa, I got hit... Ack?!

Heheh! Bullseye! Come on, what's the matter? Hurry up
and splash me back!

(What's with the power of her splashes?! This is on a
whole other level than a regular water fight!)

Don't just stand there! If you're gonna hold back,
I'll make you regret it! Come on, come on!
*gasp* I-I'm drowning! Wait! Stop, Claire!
Ahahah! Take this! And this!

With Claire sending waves of water his way, Cid gives
a convincing performance. Seeing him like this,
Claire's excitement increases even more.

After having fun at the beach, Cid and Claire decide
to eat the food they buy at the beach house.

Whew! I'm starving after all that play. You must be
too, Cid.
Yeah, I guess...

(I'm not that hungry... I mean, I could barely even
move until just now.)

Here. I'll feed you. I think this is called
takoyaki or something.

Presented to Cid is the very same piping hot takoyaki
he has seen in the modern world.

Th-That looks hot. I'll let it cool a bit first and
then eat it myself...

What're you talking about? You're supposed to eat it
when it's hot. Open your mouth. Say, "Ahhh"!
Wait, if I eat it like that, I'll burn my...mmmph!
Taste good?
Aaah! Aaah!

Heheh. You seem to be enjoying it. Here, have another
one!

Claire stuffs another takoyaki into the corner of
Cid's slightly open mouth.
Mmhh?! Aaah!

(Sh-She's stuffed another in while I'm still writhing
in pain from the heat! Is this sister of mine some
kind of demon?!)

How about some fried noodles as well?
They're filling and satisfying!

And there's also this pancake thing called okonomiyaki.
It smells and looks delicious. Come on, open your mouth!

Claire is in high spirits at the sight of Cid eating
so much. She stuffs his mouth with dish after
dish of the food she bought.
Mmff... W-Water!
*pant, pant*

Why the rush? You must've really been hungry.
You should've just told me.
That's not... Well, never mind.

Want to take another dip after you finish eating?
Or do you want to play with the beach ball?

...You know what? Since we're here, we might as well
do everything we want to do! Sounds like fun, doesn't
it, Cid?
Y-Yeah, I guess. Hahaha...

Cid has no other choice but to nod. On Claire's
insistence, he is forced to hang out with her until
the sun sets...
